25  struct timer{
26  public:
27  int duration;
28  std::chrono::_V2::steady_clock::time_point start_t;
29  void start(){
30  start_t = std::chrono::steady_clock::now();
31  }
32  void stop(){
33  auto end_t = std::chrono::steady_clock::now();
34  duration = (std::chrono::duration_cast<std::chrono::milliseconds>(end_t - start_t)).count();
35  }
36  };
